text: [Ej pajomʙar] Ūst, ki kitoʙ [-i Qur'on]-ro ʙar tu nozil kard. Baxşe az on ojoti muhkam [sarehu ravşan] ast, ki onho asosi kitoʙandu [ʙaxşi] digar mutaşoʙehot ast [ki ta'vilpazirand]; ammo kasone, ki dar dilhojaşon inhirof ast, ʙaroi fitnaçūī [va gumroh kardani mardum] va ʙa xotiri ta'vili on [ʙa dilxohi xud], az mutaşoʙehi on pajravī mekunand; hol on ki ta'vilaşro [kase] çuz Alloh taolo namedonad; va rosixoni dar ilm [ulamoi din] megūjand: "Mo ʙa hamai on [ojot, ci muhkamu ci mutaşoʙeh] imon ovardem; hama az tarafi Parvardigori most"; va çuz xiradmandon kase pand namegirad
